verses.verse: May God <S%H430><s%> be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to us, <S%H1288><s%> bless us, <S%H6440><s%> and cause his face to shine <S%H215><s%> on us. <S%H5542><s%> Selah.
That your way <S%H1870><s%> may be known <S%H3045><s%> on earth, <S%H776><s%> and your salvation <S%H3444><s%> among all nations, <S%H1471><s%>
let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> you, <S%H430><s%> God. Let all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise you. <S%H3034><s%>

Oh let the nations <S%H3816><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> and sing for joy, <S%H7442><s%> for you will judge <S%H8199><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity, <S%H4334><s%> and govern <S%H5148><s%> the nations <S%H3816><s%> on earth. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> you, <S%H430><s%> God. Let all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise you. <S%H3034><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> has yielded <S%H5414><s%> its increase. <S%H2981><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> even our own God, <S%H430><s%> will bless us. <S%H1288><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> us. <S%H657><s%> All the ends of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall fear him. <S%H3372><s%>
